adjectives.description: gardenly (comparative more gardenly, superlative most gardenly)

examples: Pulse  […]  are, in the ordinary practice of the district, planted by women, and hoed by women and children, once, twice, and sometimes thrice; giving the crop, when the soil is sufficiently free from root weeds, a gardenly appearance; which is beautiful to the eye, in the former part of the summer  […]
